flawed_nl_solution:
He wants to save $1000.00 and he has $100.00 left over so he still needs to save 1000-100= $<<1000-100=900.00>>900.00
He wants to save $900.00 over 12 months so that means he needs to save 900/12 = $<<900/12=57.00>>57.00 per month
#### 57

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 75, not 57. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
